column4: calling all Si-Fi fans, nerd in distress!! I have a USB dvd drive and its detected, is read by the system, but refuses to play my Stargate DVD :( VLC/Dragon player read the dvd for a sec that just stop. No errors or warnings or anything. HELP!!!? PLEASE!!! the fate of the universe is in the balance! <3
oh, yeah, I see it now, it was a mess with smiles after DVD word
ive tried SMPlayer, i assume thats the same hting.. it dosnt even see the DVD
does the problem appear when reading other DVDs?
i havnt really tried others.. i'll try now
has your device a power supply?
:( same result. The Bourne Identity also behaves the same. PSU.. uhmm dunno. Its a laptop. Only have this issue under linux so far
I suspect it is a hardware/drivers-related issue
how do you know it is he? :)
he had a facebook profile before the matrix forced him to delete it and go back to 4chan.
random. installed DVD codecs and now VLC plays it.. somehow thought VLC didnt need them..
